definitions.definition: A manservant having charge of wines and liquors.
The chief male servant of a household who has charge of other employees, receives guests, directs the serving of meals, and performs various personal services.
A valet , a male personal attendant .

main_definition: A manservant having charge of wines and liquors.
secondary_definitions: The chief male servant of a household who has charge of other employees, receives guests, directs the serving of meals, and performs various personal services.
A valet , a male personal attendant .
